name: Blocky Adventure: The Escape
storyline:
BLOCKY ADVENTURE - THE ESCAPE

What is limit of torture that a block could survive?
Why does a blocky need to survive all tests?
What is Cloning!
Why is Blocky Cloned?

STORY: You are BLOCKY 37 one of its kind that learnt enough to survive
this cruel world and escape the Testing Area 337. Not only you were cloned
but the failed Blockies were brutally killed!

You have been captivated for so long that now it's your turn to oppose. You were kept
under the ground and was constantly sent through series of tests.

You as a Blocky 37 have this sacred duty to escape all the Testing Area 337 with all your
fellow Blockies and come out of this Testing Area 337.

NOTE : This is very difficult game. You need lots of patience to play this game.
You may be stuck in some levels for days.

Tags: 2d, 2d platformer game, rpg, adventure, blocky
summary:
You are Blocky 37 one of its kind that learnt enough to survive
this cruel world and escape the Testing Area 337. Not only you were cloned
but the failed Blockies were brutally killed!
